title: Ep. 736 No More Apologies
description:
Summary:

In this episode I address the allegations that NSA databases were being used to illicitly spy on the Trump team. I also address the big takeaways from yesterday’s elections and the disgraceful actions of the Philadelphia Eagles’ organization. 

News Picks:

Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting hammers Hillary’s ridiculous claims about Red States. 

Was another member of the Trump team targeted by an FBI spy?

Trump is winning the culture war and even the swampy Republicans are starting to realize it.

Social Security and Medicare are going bankrupt. More ominous signs. 

More Obama administration corruption. 

Some takeaways from last night’s election.

Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
